DataElement.preferredName: No Participant Or Parent Communication Contact Occur Reason Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The explanation of the reason why a participant, or a participant's parent was not contacted regarding participation on a clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: No Participant Or Parent Communication Contact Occur
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question._Someone who takes part in an activity._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._A mother or a father; an immediate progenitor._A channel for communication between groups._Come to pass.
